alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Bullock; Dallas; Lee; Lowndes; Macon; Marengo; Montgomery; Pike; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 07 at 1:16PM CDT until October 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM ACROSS PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ALABAMA AND ONCE AGAIN ON SUNDAY... ...THE FIRE WEATHER WATCH HAS BEEN UPGRADED TO A RED FLAG WARNING FOR FAR SOUTHERN COUNTIES IN CENTRAL ALABAMA FROM 11AM TO 7PM ON SUNDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR FOR DRY FUELS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES ACROSS THE SOUTHERN THIRD OF CENTRAL ALABAMA... ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT SUNDAY FOR DRY FUELS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES ACROSS FAR SOUTHERN COUNTIES OF CENTRAL ALABAMA... The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a Red Flag Warning for dry fuels and low relative humidity values, which is in effect from 11 AM to 7 PM CDT Sunday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WINDS...North 10 to 15 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of a dry air mass and breezy conditions will result in critical fire weather conditions. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Barbour; Bullock; Dallas; Lee; Lowndes; Macon; Marengo; Montgomery; Pike; Russell
